r.s: This class acts as an interface to various online weather-services.
r.d: Services_Weather searches for given locations and retrieves current weather data and, dependent on the used service, also forecasts. Up to now, GlobalWeather from CapeScience, Weather XML from EJSE (US only), a XOAP service from Weather.com and METAR from noaa.gov are supported. Further services will get included, if they become available, have a usable API and are properly documented.
r.n: - Weatherdotcom.php o Fixed bug on receiving a weather.com originated error o Changed keyAttribute in XML_Unserializer, needed for errno retrieval
